mapper.insert:
select COMPK.nextVal as com_seq from dual
insert into bbs_comment ( bbs_no, com_no, user_no, com_content, com_date, com_show, com_seq ) values ( #{bbsNo}, NVL(((select MAX(com_no) from bbs_comment where bbs_no=#{bbsNo} )+1) , 1), 3,
#{comContent}, sysdate, 0, #{comSeq} )
mapper.select: select a.BBS_NO, a.COM_NO, a.USER_NO, a.COM_CONTENT, a.COM_DATE, a.COM_SHOW, b.user_nick from bbs_comment a, users b where bbs_no =#{bbsNo} and a.user_no = b.user_no and a.com_show =0 order by com_date asc
